extendedInfo.detail: Clorox from the makers of Clorox products. America‰Ûªs no 1 (In the US based on IRI sales data). No dish soap required; Cuts through grease; Removes baked-on food. Cuts through the tough messes. SOS Cleans Fasters (Based on laboratory testing on brunt kitchen grease vs soapy wet sponge). With Anti-Rust protection. Kitchen: Kitchen: Pots, pans stoves, broilers & stove top, oven racks, glassware, glass cookware, tile floors, utensils, plates, dishes, bowls, microwave, refrigerator shelves, removes coffee & tea stains, removes sticky tags, labels & glue. Outdoor: Lawn tools, patio furniture, barbecue grills, garden tools, grill tools, golf clubs & grips. Garage: Car windshield wipers, car windshields, chrome bumpers tires & wheels, garbage cans, hand tools. Bathroom: Tile countertops, glass shower doors porcelain tubs & sinks tile & linoleum floors. Versatile cleaning! Kitchen; Bathroom; Garage; Outdoor. Facebook. Pinterest. Twitter. YouTube.  For more product ingredients information, visit www.smartlabel.org. For cleaning tips, visit www.SOSClorox.com. Questions? Call: 1-800-767-7770.  Environmental Commitment: Box made from 100% recycled paperboard (minimum 35% post-consumer content). Contains no phosphorus.
extendedInfo.ingredients: Contains: Sodium Tallowate, Water, Glycerin, Sodium Carbonate, Sodium C10-16 Alkylbenzenesulfonate, Cocamide MEA, Sodium Nitrite, Fragrance, Sodium Hydroxide, Titanium Dioxide, Colorant And Sodium Metasilicate.
extendedInfo.directions: Directions for Use: Wet S.O.S pad with water, clean surface, rinse. To get the most from your SOS pad, remove particles & allow pad to dry. For delicate surfaces, test first by lightly using the SOS pad on a small, inconspicuous area.  Lift tab to open. Open other end.
extendedInfo.countryOfOrigin: Made In The USA.,Made In The USA. Made In The USA Of Global Components.,USA
